languages.text:
Grants a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g}.
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a daemon or a psyker for the first time in combat, the target suffers −{uip|Debuff|eaf13a1c39ee4d4a9e52ab9a195680a3} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and −1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Grants a +5 bonus to Lore (Warp) tests and +10% dodge against daemons.

Grants a +10 bonus to Lore (Warp).
Whenever the wearer hits a daemon or a psyker for the first time in combat, the target suffers −<u>(Lore (Warp) / 10)</u> Willpower and Perception and −1 psy rating until the end of combat. Does not stack.

Does not stack.

Does not stack.

languages.text:
Дает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Знаниям: Варп{/g}.
Когда персонаж впервые за бой совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} по демону или псайкеру, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воля{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g} этой цели уменьшаются на −{uip|Debuff|eaf13a1c39ee4d4a9e52ab9a195680a3}, а {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} снижается на 1 до конца боя. Эффект не суммируется.

traits.locale_text:
Дает +10 к Знаниям: Варп.
Когда персонаж впервые за бой совершает попадание по демону или псайкеру, Воля и Восприятие этой цели уменьшаются на −<u>(Знания: Варп / 10)</u>, а пси-рейтинг снижается на 1 до конца боя. Эффект не суммируется.

Эффект не суммируется.

languages.text:
获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}知识（亚空间）{/g}。
每场战斗中，当装备者首次{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}恶魔或灵能者时，目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}都会降低{uip|Debuff|eaf13a1c39ee4d4a9e52ab9a195680a3}点，{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}也会降低1级，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果不可叠加。

Grants a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g}.

Does not stack.

traits.locale_text:
获得+10知识（亚空间）。
每场战斗中，当装备者首次命中恶魔或灵能者时，目标的意志与感知都会降低<u>（知识（亚空间）/10）</u>点，灵能等级也会降低1级，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果不可叠加。

获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}知识（亚空间）{/g}。
每场战斗中，当装备者首次{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}恶魔或灵能者时，目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}都会降低{uip|Debuff|eaf13a1c39ee4d4a9e52ab9a195680a3}点，{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}也会降低1级，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果不可叠加。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}伝承(ワープ){/g}に+10の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を与える。
戦闘中着用者がディーモンや異能者に初めて{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}すると、ターゲットは戦闘終了時まで−{uip|Debuff|eaf13a1c39ee4d4a9e52ab9a195680a3}の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}知覚{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}が−1減少する。スタックしない。
languages.original_text:
Grants a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g}.
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a daemon or a psyker for the first time in combat, the target suffers −{uip|Debuff|eaf13a1c39ee4d4a9e52ab9a195680a3} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and −1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text:
伝承（歪み）に+10のボーナスを与える。
戦闘中に着用者がディーモンや異能者に初めて命中すると、ターゲットは戦闘終了時まで-<u>（伝承（歪み）/10）</u>の意志力と認知力、超能力レートが−1減少する。この効果はスタックしない。

{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}伝承(ワープ){/g}に+10の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を与える。
戦闘中着用者がディーモンや異能者に初めて{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}すると、ターゲットは戦闘終了時まで−{uip|Debuff|eaf13a1c39ee4d4a9e52ab9a195680a3}の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}知覚{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}が−1減少する。スタックしない。

languages.text:
Concede una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} +10 a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Conocimiento (disformidad){/g}.
Cuando el portador {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} a un daemon o psíquico por primera vez en combate, el objetivo sufre −{uip|Debuff|eaf13a1c39ee4d4a9e52ab9a195680a3} a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} y −1 de {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} hasta el final del combate. Este efecto no es acumulativo.

traits.locale_text:
Concede una bonificación +10 a Conocimiento (disformidad).
Cuando el portador impacta a un daemon o psíquico por primera vez en combate, el objetivo sufre −<u>(Conocimiento (disformidad) / 10)</u> a su Voluntad y Percepción y -1 de factor psíquico hasta el final del combate. Este efecto no es acumulativo.

languages.text:
Gewährt einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +10 auf {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Wissen (Warp){/g}.
Wenn der Träger im Kampf erstmals einen Dämon oder Psioniker {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, verliert das Ziel bis zum Endes des Kampfes -{uip|Debuff|eaf13a1c39ee4d4a9e52ab9a195680a3} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} sowie −1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g}. Nicht stapelbar.
languages.original_text:

Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a daemon or a psyker for the first time in combat, the target suffers −{uip|Debuff|eaf13a1c39ee4d4a9e52ab9a195680a3} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and −1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text:
Gewährt einen Bonus von +10 auf Wissen (Warp).
Wann immer der Träger im Kampf zum ersten Mal einen Dämon oder Psioniker trifft, erleidet das Ziel bis zum Endes des Kampfes −<u>(Wissen (Warp) /10)</u> Willenskraft und Willenskraft sowie −1 Psi-Wert. Addiert sich nicht.

Gewährt einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +10 auf {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Wissen (Warp){/g}.
Wann immer der Träger im Kampf zum ersten Mal einen Dämon oder Psioniker {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, erleidet das Ziel bis zum Endes des Kampfes −{uip|Debuff|eaf13a1c39ee4d4a9e52ab9a195680a3} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} sowie −1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g}. Stapelt sich nicht.

languages.text:
Confère un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Connaissance (Warp){/g} de +10.
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} un démon ou un psyker pour la première fois lors d'un combat, la cible subit -{uip|Debuff|eaf13a1c39ee4d4a9e52ab9a195680a3} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, et −1 d'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Non cumulable.

Does not stack.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} un démon ou un psyker pour la première fois lors d'un combat, la cible subit -{uip|Debuff|eaf13a1c39ee4d4a9e52ab9a195680a3} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, et −1 d'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Kültür (Öteboyut){/g} yeteneğine +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} kazandırır.
Takan kişi bir çatışmada ilk kez bir iblise veya ruhsezere {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g} hedef, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} niteliklerine −{uip|Debuff|eaf13a1c39ee4d4a9e52ab9a195680a3} ve {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}ruhsezi derecesine{/g} −1 alır. Bu etkiler, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikmez.
